camel.sink.endpoint.configurationUri.name: camel.sink.endpoint.configurationUri
camel.sink.endpoint.configurationUri.description: URI pointing to the Ehcache XML configuration file's location

camel.sink.endpoint.createCacheIfNotExis.name: camel.sink.endpoint.createCacheIfNotExist
camel.sink.endpoint.createCacheIfNotExis.description: Configure if a cache need to be created if it does exist or can't be pre-configured.

camel.sink.endpoint.action.name: camel.sink.endpoint.action
camel.sink.endpoint.action.description: To configure the default cache action. If an action is set in the message header, then the operation from the header takes precedence.

camel.sink.endpoint.key.name: camel.sink.endpoint.key
camel.sink.endpoint.key.description: To configure the default action key. If a key is set in the message header, then the key from the header takes precedence.

camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer
camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.sink.endpoint.configuration.name: camel.sink.endpoint.configuration
camel.sink.endpoint.configuration.description: The default cache configuration to be used to create caches.

camel.sink.endpoint.configurations.name: camel.sink.endpoint.configurations
camel.sink.endpoint.configurations.description: A map of cache configuration to be used to create caches.

camel.sink.endpoint.keyType.name: camel.sink.endpoint.keyType
camel.sink.endpoint.keyType.description: The cache key type, default java.lang.Object

camel.sink.endpoint.valueType.name: camel.sink.endpoint.valueType
camel.sink.endpoint.valueType.description: The cache value type, default java.lang.Object

camel.component.ehcache.configurationUri.name: camel.component.ehcache.configurationUri
camel.component.ehcache.configurationUri.description: URI pointing to the Ehcache XML configuration file's location

camel.component.ehcache.createCacheIfNot.name: camel.component.ehcache.createCacheIfNotExist
camel.component.ehcache.createCacheIfNot.description: Configure if a cache need to be created if it does exist or can't be pre-configured.

camel.component.ehcache.action.name: camel.component.ehcache.action
camel.component.ehcache.action.description: To configure the default cache action. If an action is set in the message header, then the operation from the header takes precedence.

camel.component.ehcache.key.name: camel.component.ehcache.key
camel.component.ehcache.key.description: To configure the default action key. If a key is set in the message header, then the key from the header takes precedence.

camel.component.ehcache.lazyStartProduce.name: camel.component.ehcache.lazyStartProducer
camel.component.ehcache.lazyStartProduce.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.component.ehcache.autowiredEnabled.name: camel.component.ehcache.autowiredEnabled
camel.component.ehcache.autowiredEnabled.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

camel.component.ehcache.configuration.name: camel.component.ehcache.configuration
camel.component.ehcache.configuration.description: The default cache configuration to be used to create caches.

camel.component.ehcache.configurations.name: camel.component.ehcache.configurations
camel.component.ehcache.configurations.description: A map of cache configuration to be used to create caches.

camel.component.ehcache.keyType.name: camel.component.ehcache.keyType
camel.component.ehcache.keyType.description: The cache key type, default java.lang.Object

camel.component.ehcache.valueType.name: camel.component.ehcache.valueType
camel.component.ehcache.valueType.description: The cache value type, default java.lang.Object
